EmailTemplate.name: Global_Webinar_ Ensuring Cloud Native Success: The Greenfield Journey_Q415.Pleas
EmailTemplate.subject: Your complimentary Matt Stine Microservices eBook
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for your interest in receiving Matt Stine's Microservices eBook! We will be sending your copy out this week.
Please let us know where to send your hard copy by emailing Christina Deex-Schaper at cdeex@pivotal.io <mailto:cdeex@pivotal.io>.
If you have any questions, please let me know.
Thank you, Christina Deex-Schaper Pivotal Software
